name: Newton
review:
Good theme, good storyline, great acting but lacks a required punch. The direction is sub-standard which lacks to elevate the otherwise wonderful performances by all the actors.

Storyline Rating: 3

Acting Rating: 3
Rajkummar Rao: 3
Pankaj Tripathi: 3
Anjali Patil: 3
Raghuvir Yadav: 3
Sanjay Mishra: 3

Direction Rating: 3

Music Rating: 2

Cinematography: 2

Editing: 3
